name: The mines of Inevo (idle miner game)
name_original: The mines of Inevo (idle miner game)
description:
this is idle mining game with a total of 27 diffrent materials to collect and 11 mines to mine from, there is shop with 2 things to upgrade [movement speed and light power]. The game is still in development.

Im planning on adding buyable characters with changed statistics and some more materials.
